A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Just a few words. The story-telling was excellent\, to an almost perfect extent. I would say it is always good to play with audience expectations\, but leading the audience down one path\, and then guilt-tripping them for following\, that is not as acceptable. Anyone who has seen the film will know what I'm talking about. I left the theater pleased with the movie\, but in respect to Star Wars as a franchise\, I was mostly riddled with conflicted feelings.
